summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.3°C) and outside temperature (up 2.5°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.9 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1768 m), light levels (up 5587 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 183.6m lower than yesterday, 668.3m lower than the past week, 1767.7m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 713m to a maximum of 1594m, averaging 883.4m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1551.7m and 2650m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and winds will be practically absent. Light to moderate rain is forecast, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and a mix of sun and clouds. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
